content:
The size of the design teams varies among companies, and it's difficult to provide an exact number as it can change over time. However, based on available information, here are some estimates of the size of the design teams for the UK businesses mentioned in the table:

* BBC: The BBC has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Burberry: Burberry's design team is estimated to be medium-sized, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* HSBC: HSBC has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* John Lewis: John Lewis has a medium-sized in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Marks & Spencer: Marks & Spencer has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* O2: O2 has a medium-sized in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Rolls-Royce: Rolls-Royce has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Sainsbury's: Sainsbury's has a medium-sized in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Sky: Sky has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Tesco: Tesco has a large in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.
* Virgin Atlantic: Virgin Atlantic has a medium-sized in-house design team, but the exact number of members is not publicly available.

It's worth noting that the size of the design team is not necessarily an indicator of the quality of design output. The success of the design team depends on several factors, including the leadership, talent, and resources available to the team.
